input.sentences: today i draw masterpieces ! this is [male] the ghost | my first work .
my second work is my self right eye portrait . do you like it ?
then i drew a bird coming out of the flames .
the bird made me want to draw a man ! so i did . this is [male] the naked top tree climber .
he inspired me to draw a colored tree wasting away in the sun . i eventually got tired and fell asleep .
output.sentences: At the showing, one of the many masterpieces was from my favorite male artist, and depicted a Ghost.
The portrait on an eye really spoke to me.
Another was a mound of flames, and the artist drew a phoenix coming from the ash.
One that I didn't like was of a tree, and at the top was a naked man.
We ended up wasting a lot of time at one of another tree, and got tired so we went home.
